column5: What is the best mapping software I can buy for the upper half of lac seul on a garmin handheld??? Thanks in advance

I have been very happy with www.trakmaps.com Lac Seul digital version. The laminated paper version visually looks more appealing but you cant beat real time gps tracking when you incorporate the digital map into a garmin gps unit.
I found all of the maps that I need for my trip at www.gpsfiledepot.com. The Ibycus Canada Topo maps are very detailed. It's a huge download but it's worth it. The best part is they're free.
